message: Let's split it evenly. This way, we both get a fair share and avoid the risk of losing everything later on.
Meet me in the middle of our previous offers
I'm willing to give you a slight edge, but I need to get a bigger share than in the last round. Let's make a deal and avoid risking everything!
I'll compromise, but I still need a bigger share
Time is running out, Alice. Let's meet in the middle again, but this time I need a bit more. We can both walk away with a significant amount, or risk losing everything.
Getting desperate, meet me halfway again
This is my final offer. We're running out of time, and I need to make sure I get a fair share. If you reject this, we risk losing everything.
